feed.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [GRA1/SGP1][Dedicated Servers] - Network equipment version upgrade
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Nov 29, 21:00 UTC  -  Nov 30, 00:00 UTC

Aug 24, 17:44 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 29/11/2023 21:00 UTC
End time : 30/11/2023 00:00 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our network infrastructure, we will be doing a version upgrade on multiple network equipment.

entry.title: [Global][Dedicated Servers] - End of Life Real Time Monitoring APIv6
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Nov 7, 09:30 - 10:00 UTC

Sep 22, 11:30 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 07/11/2023 09:30 UTC
End time : 07/11/2023 10:00 UTC
Service impact : The End of Life of Real Time Monitoring (RTM) for baremetal is scheduled for the 7th of November 2023.
Few customers will be impacted (less than 10) and will stop be able to monitor their dedicated servers via the APIv6. This will impact APIv6 calls /dedicated/server/{serviceName}/statistics.

entry.title: [GRA1][Dedicated Servers] - Rack G118B06
entry.content:
Oct 29, 14:23 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 29/10/2023 11:38 UTC
End time : 29/10/2023 14:00 UTC
Root cause : Network equipment issue
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Oct 29, 11:43 UTC
Identified - Start time : 29/10/2023 11:38 UTC
Service impact : Public network is temporarily unavailable for servers in rack G118B06
Root cause : A network equipment caused the issue
Ongoing actions : Our teams are are currently working to solve the problem

entry.title: [CA/EU][Dedicated Servers] - vRack add/delete unavailable
entry.content:
Oct 29, 12:25 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 28/10/2023 03:00 UTC
Service impact : Customers are unable to add or delete a dedicated severs from vRack
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

entry.title: [GRA2][Dedicated Servers] - G263A05
entry.content:
Oct 28, 04:07 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 28/10/2023 01:38 UTC
End time : 28/10/2023 04:01 UTC
Root cause : Incident caused by a circuit breaker that tripped due to a problem with the cooling system.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Oct 28, 02:35 UTC
Identified - Update : Most of the servers are operational, but 9 IPs are still down.

Oct 28, 01:49 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 28/10/2023 01:38 UTC
Service impact : Servers in the rack G263A05 are no longer responding.
Ongoing actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident and fix it.
Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

entry.content:
Oct 27, 22:58 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 27/10/2023 07:13 UTC
End time : 27/10/2023 22:47 UTC

Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Oct 27, 19:49 UTC
Update - We are continuing to work on a fix for this issue.

Oct 27, 15:48 UTC
Update - We are continuing to work on a fix for this issue.

Oct 27, 08:24 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Oct 27, 07:55 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 27/10/2023 07:13 UTC
Service impact : Some of the servers in rack S351B03 are currently unreachable.
Ongoing actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident and fix it.
Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

entry.title: [RBX8][Dedicated Servers] - R820L22
entry.content:
Oct 27, 19:39 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 27/10/2023 16:28 UTC
End time : 27/10/2023 19:36 UTC
Service impact : The situation is back to normal, the service is running nominally.
Root cause : It was due to a malfunction on a power supply.

Oct 27, 16:48 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Oct 27, 16:47 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 27/10/2023 16:28 UTC
Service impact : The Tor (Top Of Rack) Vrack is unreachable on this onenetwork rack.
Some slowness is going to be observed during the intervention of the technicians.
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be posted as significant progress is made.
